types.feat: Commits, that adds or remove a new feature
types.build: Commits, that affect build components like build tool, ci pipeline, dependencies, project version, ...
types.deps: Update dependecy version or Add new dependecy or Remove outdated dependecy or Replace dependency or Update submodule
types.style: Commits, that do not affect the meaning (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
types.refactor: Commits, that rewrite/restructure your code, however does not change any API behaviour
types.test: Commits, that add missing tests or correcting existing tests
types.perf: Commits are special refactor commits, that improve performance
types.ci: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)
types.temp: Add new feature or Fix bug in code or Save work in progress or Share changes for feedback

example: feat: add new feature like booking system
